どこに進む？:
Where will we be
proceeding to?
えー？らしんばん、まわすのー？: Huh?... Are you gonna spin it?...
大型飛行艇による\n航空偵察を実施します。:
Conducting aerial reconnaissance
by flying boat.
航空偵察予定地点に到着しましたが、\n稼働偵察機がないため、偵察を中止します。:
We have arrived at the planned aerial
reconnaissance point, but there is no
operational reconnaissance aircraft.
敵影を見ず。\n本作戦完遂失敗。:
No enemy in sight.
We failed to complete this operation.
艦隊の針路を選択できます。\n提督、どちらの針路をとられますか？:
You can decide on the fleet's course.
Admiral, which heading should we take?
波静かな、泊地に適した海域です。:
The waves are quiet.
This area is suitable for an anchorage.
残念ですが進撃は困難です...母港に帰投します。:
It's a shame but we can't continue like this...
Returning to the home port.
天祐は我に在り。艦隊泊地突入! 救出作業開始!:
We're blessed by divine grace.
We're now entering the anchorage!
     Commence rescue operations!
……帰ろう。帰れば、また来ることができる。:
Let's turn back now...
We will be able to come back if we do so.
突入海域の霧が……。: The fog in these waters is...!
これより戦場海域に突入す。艦隊、戦闘配置!:
We are now entering the battlefield area.
Fleet, battle stations!
これより鉄底海峡に突入す! 全艦、戦闘配置!:
We are now entering the strait.
All ships, battle stations!
鉄底海峡を離脱する! 引き続き警戒を厳とせよ!:
We're leaving the Iron Bottom Strait!
Remain on high alert!
マラッカ海峡を抜ける…対潜警戒を厳にせよ！:
Once we pass through the Strait of Malacca...
be on high alert for submarines!
我、マラッカ海峡に突入す。: Our fleet is charging into the Strait of Malacca.
我、マラッカ海峡を突破、アンダマン海へ！:
Our fleet broke through the Strait of Malacca!
We're now going towards the Andaman Sea!
輸送物資の揚陸地点に到達しました。\n同地点付近の敵艦隊を捜索、これを撃滅せよ！:
The landing point of the convoy has been
reached. Search for and destroy the enemy
     fleet in the vicinity of this area.
輸送物資の揚陸地点に到達しました。\n本海域の輸送作戦は無事完了しています。:
The landing point of the convoy has been
reached. The transport operation here has
     already been completed successfully.
輸送物資の揚陸地点に到達しました。\n物資の揚陸を開始します。:
The landing point of the convoy has been
reached. Starting the landing of supplies.
